Lynn.Liberty Tree Mall:
The Liberty Tree Mall is a shopping mall in Danvers, Massachusetts, U.S. that is one-third owned by the Simon Property Group. The Simon Property Group owns the common area of the mall between Kohl's and Best Buy, but manages the entire property; while the right-hand area of the property from Best Buy to Staples is owned by Target, and the property from Kohl's to Dick's Sporting Goods is owned by New England Development, the mall's original developer.


== History ==
Construction began in 1969, and the mall opened with a dedication ceremony on February 21, 1972.
